data.text:
Due to Covid-19, the event has been canceled.

“Challenge yourself to a Triathlon”

–Speaker Event for New England Kids Triathlon

Do your kids love swimming, biking, running and giving back to the community? Please join us to learn more about the annual New England Kids Triathlon Race and hear from two world-class athletes on their inspirational story. Event is free and open to public, both kids and parents are welcome. Registration at TriathonSpeech.WeForm.net. Refreshment will be provided.

When: Tuesday, March 17 7-8:30pm

Where: Lexington Community Center, Rm 237

Almon Gunter is the CEO and President of Almon Gunter Motivates, Inc. He is a highly acclaimed motivational, inspirational public speaker, author, and consultant, as well as a two-time US Olympic Trial Qualifier in track and field. He is the author of four self-help books. As a world-class sprinter in track Almon competed internationally in over 15 countries. At the height of his running career, Almon ran the 13th fastest time in the world for 200 meters. He uses these experiences and success on the track to help others reach their maximum velocity performance in the game of life.

Heidi Wu is a former professional swimmer and national champion in China. She ranked the third overall in her age group in the 2019 Ironman 70.3 Shanghai-Chongming race and qualified for 2020 Ironman 70.3 World Championship. She was the age group champion in the 2019 China Ironman Shangtou race and ranked the fifth in the overall women’s race. She will be representing China in the 2020 Ironman Asia Championship.

This event is sponsored by Kids Triathlon Inc, Lingzi Foundation and TriLex Kids Triathlon club.
